name: GKLeaderboard.Entry

items.desc: The date and time when the player earns the score.

items.name: func challengeComposeController(withMessage: String?, players: [GKPlayer]?, completionHandler: GKChallengeComposeCompletionBlock?) -> UIViewController
items.desc: Provides a challenge compose view controller with preselected player identifiers and a preformatted, player-editable message.
